dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 724 IH: To amend the Clean Air Act to remove the requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Latta (for himself and Mr. Peters of Michigan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act to remove the requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles.

section.header: Removal of requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles
section.text: Section 207(h) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7541(h)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (2) and (3) as paragraphs (1) and (2), respectively.
